name: Cupcake {Collection}
description:
Welcome to Never Grow Up Party Planning with the busy mom in mind.

These PDF printable files are the perfect addition to your little ones 1st birthday! I recommend printing on cardstock paper. Package comes with Banner, Treat bag Designs, Thank You tags, Cupcake Toppers & Invites.

Banner Tips: Print, cut into squares, punch two holes at the top of each square then run ribbon through holes to connect squares. 5x5 each.

Treat Bag Designs: They are 2(h) x5 (l) in size. I receommend getting the clear plastic treat bags, filling with candy, then staple these to the top to close them off.

Cupcake Toppers: Print onto card stock, Cut out with designed hole punch from your local craft store or cutting machine. Attach to wooden stick also found at a local craft store. 3x3 each.

Thank You Tags: Can be used on party favors or as stickers. 2 inches each.

Invites: Recommend printing on cardstock. I recommend adding aqua ribbon to the top of the invites. Size 5x7.

Please add in notes section during when placing your order any text you would like to add for example age, name, happy birthday, etc.

Designs by: Â© Dreamlike Magic Designs www.dreamlikemagic.com

Thanks for stopping in...

Find more photos of this collection and more party tips at:
http://www.facebook.com/NeverGrowUpPartyPlanning

name: How to Train a Dragon Collection
description:
Welcome to Never Grow Up Party Planning with the busy mom in mind.

These PDF printable files are the perfect addition to your dragon party. I recommend printing on cardstock paper. Package comes with Banner, Labels, Thank You tags, Cupcake Toppers & Invites.

Banner Tips: Print, cut into squares, punch two holes at the top of each square then run ribbon through holes to connect squares. 5x5 each.

Cupcake Toppers: Print onto card stock, Cut out with designed hole punch from your local craft store or cutting machine. Attach to wooden stick also found at a local craft store. 3x3 each.

Thank You Tags: Can be used on party favors or as stickers. 2 inches each.

Invites: Recommend printing on cardstock. I burned the edges of the invites to create a more dramatic effect. I recommend doing this over your kitchen sink. Size 5x7.

Please add in notes section during when placing your order any text you would like to add for example age, name, happy birthday, etc.

Thanks for stopping in...

Find more photos of this collection and more party tips at:
http://www.facebook.com/NeverGrowUpPartyPlanning

name: Tea For 2 Collection
description:
Welcome to Never Grow Up Party Planning with the busy mom in mind.

PDF Printable files package comes with cupcake labels, banner, water bottle labels, and custom tea bags.These printables will add the perfect touch to your tea party or up coming baby shower.

Cupcake Labels: Size 3x3. I recommend printing them and then cutting them with a cutter from your local craft store (2.5) or a cutting machine. 

Banner Tips: Size 5x5. I recommend printing, cutting, then placing two holes at the top of the squares and running ribbon through them to connect the squares.

Water bottle label tips: I recommend printing on water resistant paper. Otherwise ink will run if put on ice or condensation is applied. 

Please add in the notes section when placing your order any text you would like to add for example age, name, happy birthday, etc.

Thanks for stopping in...

Find more photos of this collection and more party tips at:
http://www.facebook.com/NeverGrowUpPartyPlanning
